Introduction
[SCU_Reset_RESET001 App]

Introduction

SCU_Reset_RESET001App provides the user or high level program to Reset an individual peripheral , check the reset status of the peripheral and identifying the reset type.

Scope

The RESET001 App provides APIs to reset a peripheral block, check the reset status and also API to identify the reset type.

RESET001_abbreviation

  1. API: Application Program Interface
  2. App: DAVE3 Application
  3. GUI: Graphical User Interface
  4. SW: Software

RESET_reference

XMC4500 Reference Manual.

RESET001_limitation

NA
